user.name: Shivani Firodiya
user.subtitle: Bringing ideas to reality with cutting-edge technology

currentRole.description: Launched Sponsored Display across 11 markets; re-architected a monolith into microservices; cut ad-serving latency by 50% with a high-throughput distributed cache; built geo-targeting; automated DynamoDB retention; migrated analytics to Spektr; delivered an MCP server with Amazon Q retrieval.

masters.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

bachelors.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

experiences.description: Launched Sponsored Display across 11 markets; re-architected monolith into 4 microservices; cut ad-serving latency by 50% (p95) with a distributed cache; built geo-targeting; migrated analytics pipelines to Spektr; delivered an MCP server with Amazon Q retrieval; automated DynamoDB retention via EventBridge-triggered Glue jobs.
Worked on Digital Payments transaction processing; built a React dashboard for real-time progress tracking across teams; improved code coverage for the product codebase.

Replaced legacy file-based installation with a database-backed approach; implemented a secure scalable REST-assured framework to automate QA unit testing in CI; containerized B2Bi and moved to production.
Completed a PoC using MongoDB instead of Apache SOLR for Contract Management; automated workflows using bash and Python scripting in existing product.

projects.description: End-to-end cheapest travel plan application with microservice architecture supporting flight and cab search functionality.
highlights: Explored CI/CD pipeline and service discovery using Consul

projects.description: Implemented source separation using Gaussian Mixture Models and trained DNN on RAVDESS dataset for sentiment analysis.

projects.description: Parallel file search implementation using pthreads, achieving 50% performance improvement over traditional grep.

projects.title: Click Through Rate Analysis
projects.description: Predicted click-through rates using CNN and Autoencoders to improve advertisement clickability and performance metrics.
